review: A real suprise buy! Its definately one of the best open world survival games involving zombies, Rust and DayZ could learn a thing or two from this game. I highly recommend you get this game you won't be disapointed.

helpful: 1 of 2 people (50%) found this review helpful
review: Excellent game, good value and especially coop feature makes it highly entertaining playing with a friend to complete missions and is a great feature sadly missing from most games. Downloaded content is good value and extra campaigns are excellent with hopefully more to come. Definately worth it.

Quite simply one of the best first person horror adventure games I have ever played ( but i am a fan of the alien). The tension and game play make for an awsome experience, totally enjoyable game and scary.
